original_text:
“Alas, alas, for the great city
    that was clothed in fine linen,
        in purple and scarlet,
    adorned with gold,
        with jewels, and with pearls!
korean_text: 이르되 화 있도다 화 있도다 큰 성이여 세마포 옷과 자주 옷과 붉은 옷을 입고 금과 보석과 진주로 꾸민 것인데

sentences.original_text: Alas, alas, for the great city
sentences.korean_translation: 화 있도다, 화 있도다, 그 큰 성이여

sentences.original_text: that was clothed in fine linen,
